message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The uric acid levels in the blood are within the normal reference range for newborns. Since there are no other abnormal findings on physical examination, no therapy is required for this infant. Allopurinol and Febuxostat are not appropriate for newborns and Sodium bicarbonate is used to treat metabolic acidosis, which is not present in this case.
